author: Carl Gibson
title: 'Ignorant and stupid': GOP senator dragged on social media for comment about Civil War and slavery
text: 'Ignorant and stupid': GOP senator dragged on social media for comment about Civil War and slavery After presidential candidate and former UN ambassador Nikki Haley failed to condemn slavery when answering a question about the cause of the Civil War, Sen. Tom Cotton (R-Arkansas) decided to weigh in with a comment of his own. "The Civil War started because the American people elected an anti-slavery Republican as president and Democrats revolted rather than accept minor restrictions on the expansion of slavery to the western territories," [Cotton posted to X](https://twitter.com/TomCottonAR/status/1740423719108178006) (formerly Twitter) on Thursday. Cotton's tweet was met with almost universal scorn on the social media platform, with journalists and pundits pointing out the Arkansas Republican's false equivalency of antebellum-era politics with today's very different political environment. POLL: [Should Trump be allowed to hold office again?](https://www.alternet.org/2022poll-2656328721-2656635245-2657039473-2659450392/) "MAGA propagandists like Tom Cotton don't want you to understand that Southern racists used to be Democrats but are Republicans now. This partisan sea change happened through the 1960s, '70s and '80s," former Chicago Tribune editor Mark Jacob [tweeted](https://twitter.com/MarkJacob16/status/1740452537386328143). "It's explained in those history books that Republicans don't want you to read." Liberal social media personality Ron Filipowski piled on in a similar fashion, calling Cotton's tweet "another ignorant and stupid analogy." "This Republican Party doesn’t even resemble the one from 2015 much less 1860," Filipowski [tweeted](https://twitter.com/RonFilipkowski/status/1740447671972991441). "And the white southern Dixiecrats all switched to Republicans in the 1970-80s, so the Democratic Party today also in no way resembles that of 1860." Daily Beast columnist Wajahat Ali [went even further](https://twitter.com/WajahatAli/status/1740445965629469092), reminding his followers that it isn't Democrats but Republicans that today are defending the preservation of Confederate monuments. READ MORE: ['I'll vote for Biden': Top Koch group official rebels against Nikki Haley endorsement](https://www.alternet.org/koch-rebels-nikki-haley/) "Democrats today aren't waving or defending the Confederate flag or lamenting about the 'lost cause.' That's Tom Cotton's GOP," Ali tweeted. "If Lincoln was a Republican today, the MAGA extremists would probably try to assassinate him." And in response to Cotton's [follow-up tweet](https://twitter.com/TomCottonAR/status/1740423721586929719) in which he wrote that "Democrats would sooner tear the country apart than treat all citizens equally before the law, regardless of color," Ali [fired back](https://twitter.com/WajahatAli/status/1740446203395924420). "Tom Cotton will support Trump for President who cited Hitler and said immigrants poison the blood of this country and incited a failed insurrection, but go on about equality and tearing the country apart," he wrote. South Carolina-based pediatrician Dr. Michael O'Brien was simple in his criticism, [tweeting](https://twitter.com/DrOBrienMD/status/1740446737121354184), "Tom Cotton is a prime example of why we should never ban books." READ MORE: [Tom Cotton slammed for boosting conspiracy theories about journalists](https://www.alternet.org/tom-cotton-journalists/) [John Stoehr - Alternet.org ›](https://www.alternet.org/author/johnstoehr) ['How fascists act': Trump slammed for demanding Biden weaponize government to help him ›](https://www.alternet.org/news-politics/donald-trump-joe-biden/) [Lauren Boebert says liberals want Earth Day to be about climate change 'to divide us' ›](https://www.alternet.org/boebert-liberals-earth-day-divide/)

author: financialcontent.com
title: hoggo Pioneers Vision for Transparent Data Privacy Practices | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Berlin, Germany - hoggo, a leading force in the realm of data privacy, is on a mission to revolutionize the way businesses approach and showcase their commitment to safeguarding personal data. With a vision centered on transparency, the company aims to help organizations build trust with their customers by showcasing their data privacy practices, resulting in increased sales and an enhanced brand image.
Our Vision: Building transparency around data privacy
hoggo is dedicated to transforming privacy from a perceived dull risk into an exciting opportunity for businesses. By assisting them in showcasing robust data protection practices, the company believes that businesses can turn privacy concerns into a competitive advantage.
Our Mission: Eliminating privacy concerns
One of hoggo's key initiatives is the elimination of privacy concerns through the automation of risk assessment processes. This allows businesses to optimize resources and maintain trust with their clientele. No longer do organizations need to worry about privacy or engage in tedious manual processes.
Meet the Amazing Team Behind Hoggo
- Samuel Solberg, Co-Founder & CEO, certified by iapp
- Noa Kahalon, Co-Founder & COO, certified by iapp
- Toni Stjepanovic, Co-Founder & CTO, certified by AWS
- Marc Illien, Head of Front-End
- Roland Züger, Head of Full-Stack
A Letter From Our Founders
As technology advances, the importance of protecting privacy has never been more critical. Governments are continually adapting privacy laws to keep pace with the evolving landscape, presenting challenges for many companies. At hoggo, we believe that privacy isn't a lost cause. Our goal is to simplify the complexities of privacy regulations and risks, enabling individuals and companies to focus on what they do best—innovate.
hoggo encourages businesses to be innovative while staying smart about privacy. The company is committed to helping organizations navigate the intricate world of privacy regulations and risks so that they can continue to thrive in the ever-changing technological landscape.
For more information, visit https://hoggo.io .
About hoggo
hoggo is a trailblazing company dedicated to transforming the landscape of data privacy. By providing innovative solutions and expert guidance, hHoggo empowers businesses to showcase their commitment to privacy, build trust with customers, and navigate the evolving regulatory environment.
Connect with Hoggo
Twitter : https://www.linkedin.com/company/hoggo-io/
Facebook : https://twitter.com/hoggo_io
 Hoggo
Contact Person: Noa Kahalon
Email: Send Email
Phone: +49 017659900648
City: Berlin
Country: Germany
Website: https://hoggo.io/

author: 360 Чехов
title: Летняя смена началась в гимназии № 7 в Чехове
text:
Летняя смена началась в гимназии № 7 в Чехове
Летнюю смену в гимназии № 7 в Чехове проводят во второй раз. В 2025 году в оздоровительном лагере отдохнут 73 ребенка с 1 по 6 классы.
С яркими плакатами и запоминающимися девизами ребята выстроились на торжественную линейку. Для детей подготовили викторины, творческие задания и спортивные активности. Сюрпризом для них стало выступление хип-хоп коллектива HOT DANCE COMMUNITY — победителя отборочного этапа фестиваля «Город танцует в парках». Участников поприветствовали первый заместитель главы Денис Разуваев и председатель Совета депутатов Галина Козина.
«Организованы профильные лагеря, где вы сможете поучаствовать в различных проектах, подготовиться к олимпиадному движению. В этом году в лагерях особое внимание уделяется патриотическому воспитанию. Ваши педагоги подготовили огромное количество мероприятий на сплочение командного духа, развитие вашего трудолюбия», — сказала начальник управления образования Ирина Заболотнева.
Летняя смена продлится с 10 июня по 9 июля.
«У нас очень обширная программа запланирована: посещение библиотек и музеев, бассейн рядом. Дети очень активные, хотели в лагерь, потому что многие были в прошлом году. Родителям тоже понравилось, поэтому проблем с набором не было вообще», — сказала заместитель директора гимназии № 7 Марина Недвецкая.
Всего в Чехове организовано 25 лагерей дневного пребывания на базе школ для 560 учеников в возрасте от 7 до 12 лет. Площадки работают до 9 июля. Для ребят от 12 до 15 лет открыты 17 профильных лагерей до 30 июня. Здесь 200 человек примут участие в различных активностях. Особое внимание в этом году будет уделено патриотическому воспитанию и работе с молодежью.

author: Sabrina Reichhard
title: WhatsApp-KI soll Zugriff auf alle Chats haben: Das steckt wirklich hinter den Gerüchten
text:
WhatsApp-KI soll Zugriff auf alle Chats haben: Das steckt wirklich hinter den Gerüchten
WhatsApp-KI soll Zugriff auf alle Chats haben: Das steckt wirklich hinter den Gerüchten
Sabrina Reichhard
Symbol gekennzeichneten Links sind
Affiliate-Links. Erfolgt darüber ein Einkauf, erhalten wir eine
Provisionohne Mehrkosten für Sie. Die redaktionelle Auswahl und Bewertung der Produkte bleibt davon unbeeinflusst. Ihr Klick hilft bei der Finanzierung unseres kostenfreien Angebots.
Ein WhatsApp-Kettenbrief sorgt derzeit für Aufregung. Es wird behauptet, dass KI-Systeme legal auf private Chats und persönliche Daten zugreifen können, wenn Nutzer den sogenannten „erweiterten Chat-Datenschutz“ nicht aktiviert haben.
Diese irreführende Nachricht schürt Angst, weil sie eine Bedrohung durch KI beschreibt, die es tatsächlich gar nicht gibt. Laut „Mimikama“ bleiben WhatsApp-Chats durchgängig Ende-zu-Ende-verschlüsselt, sodass Inhalte immer geschützt sind.
Nutzer müssen die KI-Funktionen in WhatsApp erst aktivieren
Die neuen KI-Funktionen in dem Messenger greifen erst dann auf Inhalte zu, wenn Nutzer diese bewusst aktivieren, wie beispielsweise die Nutzung von Meta AI. Ohne aktiven Einsatz dieser Funktionen bleibt die KI inaktiv.
„Mimikama“ erklärt, dass der erweiterte Chat-Datenschutz eine freiwillige Funktion ist, die zusätzliche Kontrolle, etwa über Medienzugriff, bietet, aber nicht erforderlich ist, um Sicherheit zu gewährleisten.
Der Kettenbrief nutzt eine typische Desinformationsstrategie, indem er Begriffe wie „legaler Zugriff“ und „Cybersicherheit“ verwendet, um Leser zu verunsichern. Dies führt dazu, dass sich WhatsApp-Nutzer bedroht fühlen.
WhatsApp-Nachrichten bleiben geschützt
WhatsApp und Meta betonen, dass alle Nachrichten durch Ende-zu-Ende-Verschlüsselung geschützt bleiben, unabhängig davon, ob der erweiterte Chat-Datenschutz aktiviert ist.
Diese Verschlüsselung gewährleistet, dass niemand außerhalb des Chats, einschließlich WhatsApp oder Meta, Zugriff auf die Inhalte hat. Der Kettenbrief gefährdet das Vertrauen in die digitale Sicherheit und zeigt, wie wichtig es ist, sich nicht von Falschmeldungen täuschen zu lassen.
Grundlegende Informationen zu WhatsApp
- Seit seiner Gründung im Jahr 2009 durch Brian Acton und Jan Koum hat sich WhatsApp als führende Messaging-App etabliert. Die Anwendung ermöglicht Benutzern, Nachrichten und Dateien bequem über das Internet zu versenden und zu empfangen.
- Im Jahr 2014 wurde WhatsApp von Facebook übernommen, das nun unter dem Namen Meta Platforms bekannt ist. Bis 2023 erreichte die App eine Nutzerzahl von 2,78 Milliarden.
- WhatsApp bietet eine Vielzahl von Funktionen, darunter das Senden und Empfangen von Textnachrichten in Einzel- oder Gruppenchats mit bis zu 256 Teilnehmern. Benutzer können zudem Sprach- und Videoanrufe tätigen und problemlos Fotos, Videos sowie Dateien teilen.
- Seit Juni 2023 bietet WhatsApp sogenannte Channels an, die insbesondere für Unternehmen eine neue Möglichkeit zur Verbesserung ihrer Marketingstrategien darstellen.
Außerdem sind in WhatsApp jetzt neue Buttons zu sehen, die das Texten noch leichter machen. Erste Nutzer profitieren bereits von der Neuerung.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: Hezki Baruch
title: Netanyahu cancels discussion on 'the day after the war' following criticism
text: MK Dan Illouz (Likud) responded, "When will the day after come? Only when the enemy sees the seventh of October as a day of mourning. His day of mourning. Right now, it's a happy day for him. A day when a small organization managed to surprise a large army. Every survey of the Palestinian population shows this. Only when the enemy sees this day as a day of sorrow that brought destruction upon him, only then can we start talking about the day after." "This is the only way we can make sure that the terrible massacre of the seventh of October does not give rise to another massacre inspired by it, in the Gaza Strip or in other sectors. We can start talking and discussing all kinds of theoretical options now. But the day after is still far away. It is no less than an existential issue. We will not compromise on that, even if there is pressure from our closest friends," he added. National Security Minister Itamar Ben Gvir said, "The Concept Cabinet was authorized to oversee the maneuver, and not to set policy for the day after. This is the role of the Political-Security Cabinet and the discussions on the day after should be conducted in the Political-Security Cabinet and not in the Concept Cabinet with Gantz." Sources close to Prime Minister Netanyahu said in response to the criticism, "Prime Minister Netanyahu made it clear that the day after Hamas, there will be neither Hamastan nor Fatahstan in the Gaza Strip. In any case, the discussion on the issue will be brought before the Political-Security Cabinet.”

author: @PortalNDMais
title: Central do Tempo: frente fria e ciclone afetam o clima em SC
text:
O tempo muda em Santa Catarina devido à atuação de uma frente fria associada a um ciclone extratropical. A sexta-feira (13), será marcada por tempo instável, com muitas nuvens e risco de temporais no final do dia. As temperaturas começam amenas pela manhã, mas à tarde o calor e a abafada dominam. Acompanhe as previsões completas da Camila Levien na Central do Tempo.
[Balanço Geral Florianópolis](https://ndmais.com.br/nd-play/programa/balanco-geral-florianopolis/)

author: Jimena Leguizamón
title: Fuerte temporal afectó a varias localidades del centro y sur de Misiones
text:
Lluvias intensas y tormentas con fuertes ráfagas de viento azotaron diferentes áreas de la provincia de Misiones este viernes, ocasionando daños significativos en varias localidades. Los destrozos incluyeron la caída de árboles, voladuras de techos y cortes en el suministro de energía eléctrica.
Una de las localidades afectas fue Leandro N. Alem , donde las ráfagas de viento comenzaron a llegar desde las 06:30 de la mañana. Un primer relevamiento reveló decenas de árboles caídos en diversos sectores de la ciudad, con al menos 25 viviendas con techos arrancados. El Comité de Crisis se encuentra en plena acción para asistir a los damnificados.
Energía de Misiones también reportó graves consecuencias, indicando que numerosos postes y árboles caídos dejaron sin electricidad a localidades como Garupá, Candelaria, San José, Santa Ana y Oberá .
Leer también: Leandro N. Alem se recupera tras el temporal: autoridades destacan la colaboración ciudadana
Las condiciones climáticas adversas persisten en otros puntos, como en la ciudad de El Soberbio y en otras localidades del norte de Misiones, donde las autoridades continúan monitoreando la situación.
